title: Virtual RiscPC (VRPC-SA) updated to April 2010
description:
+----------------------------------------------------------------------+
        |                                                                      |
        |   Supplied......:  Acorn Antiques    Release name..:  VRPCSA.rar     |
        |   Packaged......:  filth             Release type..:  Util           |
        |   Protection....:  none              Language......:  English        |
        |   Crack/SN......:  n/a               Size..........:  192 MB         |
        |   Format........:  Various           OS............:  RISC OS        |
        |                                                                      |
        |   MD5 checksum.................: b850d4982e3924a535458fc20b8c39fd    |
        |                                                                      |
        |   ================================================================   |
        |                            Description                               |
        |   ================================================================   |
        |                                                                      |
        |   "Virtual Acorn allows you to run the Acorn operating system        |
        |   RISC OS on a Windows PC with Windows 2000, XP, Vista or            |
        |   Windows 7, and on a fast G4, G5 or Intel Mac with                  |
        |   Mac OS X 10.4 or later. Any RISC OS programs can then be           |
        |   run on the PC. VirtualAcorn can operate inside a window,           |
        |   just like any other Windows application, but can also run          |
        |   full screen. In full screen mode the PC looks and feels            |
        |   just like an Acorn computer. VirtualAcorn requires no              |
        |   extra hardware to be fitted in your PC and can be                  |
        |   installed in minutes."                                             |
        |                                                                      |
        |   A comprehensive emulator of the Acorn RiscPC platform, including   |
        |   RISC OS 4.02 software with networking capability. The SA version   |
        |   is much more powerful than the SE version (released previously),   |
        |   as it includes more VCPU support as well as a higher-speed screen  |
        |   redraw, HostFS2, Windows clipboard support, and more.              |
        |                                                                      |
        |   VirtualRPC-SA for Windows is a fully-activated version which also  |
        |   emulates StrongARM-based architecture.                             |
        |                                                                      |
        |   Install is a directory to drop into "Program Files" and tested on  |
        |   Windows XP.                                                        |
        |                                                                      |
        |   Product details: http://www.virtualacorn.co.uk/products/vrpcsa.htm |
        |   Comparison with VRPC-SE: http://www.virtualacorn.co.uk/product.htm |
        |                                                                      |
